abstract: Panel convened by Centers for Disease Control and Prevention votes, 14 to 1, electing not to explicitly recommend new vaccine against dangerous strain of Meningitis and opting instead to leave recommendation up to doctors; while strain has proved dangerous, it is relatively rare, and vaccine is costly.
lead_paragraph: A committee convened by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention opted to let doctors decide on the vaccine, which is new and relatively costly.

headline.main: Health Panel Recommends Cautious Approach to Meningitis B Vaccine
headline.print_headline: Panel Recommends Cautious Approach to Meningitis B Vaccine

snippet: A committee convened by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention opted to let doctors decide on the vaccine, which is new and relatively costly.

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
